title: 820-3115B - No Backlight, No Boost?
message:
Hello!

I've got an image, chime etc..
Can't quite work out if the chip is screwed or its something else, nothing on backlight filter and i'm unsure what the BKL_ISEN is suppose to be on a normal board. Don't have one to hand.
Any help would be amazing!

This board is undamaged, No drop or water damage. Backlight was flickering randomly for a few hours, it then died completely
Diode mode test on PIN 2 D9701 (Red on ground, Black on pin) = 0.597


PPBUS_SW_BKL
L9701 PIN 1 - 12.6v
L9701 PIN 2 - 12.6v

PP5V_S0_BKL - 5v
C9710 PIN 1 - 5v
C9710 PIN 2 - 0 (GND)

PP3v3_S0_BKL_VDDIO - 3.3v
C9711 PIN 1 - 3.3v
C9711 PIN 2 - 0v (GND)

L9701 (INDUCTOR, NO BOOST!?)
PIN 1 - 12.5
PIN 1 - 12.5

BLK_VSYNC_R (HAVE TESTED BOTH RESISTORS, 10k EACH)
R9755 PIN 1 - 0v
R9755 PIN 2 - 0v

BLK_FLTR
R9741 PIN 1 - 0v
R9741 PIN 2 - 0v

BLK_SCL
R9753 PIN 1 - 3.3v
R9753 PIN 2 - 3.3v

BLK_SDA
R9757 PIN 1 - 3.3v
R9757 PIN 2 - 3.3v

BKL_ISET
R9714 PIN 1 - 0v
R9714 PIN 2 - 0v

BKL_EN
R9731 PIN 1 - 12.5v
R9731 PIN 2 - 3.1v

(DIODE AFTER INDUCTOR)
D9701 PIN 1 - 12.6v
D9701 PIN 2 - 12.6v

(FEEDBACK LINE)
XW9720 PIN 1 - 3.5v
XW9720 PIN 2 - 3.5v

BKL_PWM (WORKING)
R9703 PIN 1 - 3.3v
R9703 PIN 2 - 3.3v

BKL_ISEN1 - R9717 - 0.5v / 0.5v
BKL_ISEN2 - R9718 - 0.27v / 0.27v (PROBE POINT 0.450v)
BKL_ISEN3 - R9719 - 0.16v / 0.16v (PROBE POINT 0.203v)
BKL_ISEN4 - R9720 - 0.16v / 0.16v (PROBE POINT 0.16v)
BKL_ISEN5 - R9721 - 0.16v / 0.16v
BKL_ISEN6 - R9722 - 0.12v / 0.11v

TP_BKL_FAULT - 0v

title: 820-3115B - No Backlight, No Boost?
message:
Thanks Rossman!!

I will swap and update,

Do you know what i should be expecting on the BKL_iSEN clusters??
